In the suggested matlab code for the function vdot.m (which is called 
by reactor_ode.m), volume change to keep constant pressure is 
calculated by
v = 1.e11 * (pressure(gas) - 101325);
The comments specify that this is valid only for 1 atm.  What about 
isobaric processes at other pressures?  How is the coefficient 1.e11 
calculated?  Is it a function of pressure?

Paul
